alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 3:26AM CDT until April 01 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN JACKSON AND CENTRAL MADISON COUNTIES... At 326 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over eastern Huntsville, moving east at 50 mph. A 65 mph gust was measured at HSV international HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Scottsboro, Moores Mill, Redstone Arsenal, Skyline, Gurley, Woodville, Alabama A And M University, Pleasant Groves and Hytop. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for north central and northeastern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
